properties.areaDesc: Laguna Madre From 5 nm North Of Port Mansfield To Baffin Bay TX; Laguna Madre From the Port Of Brownsville to the Arroyo Colorado; Waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX from 20 to 60 NM; Laguna Madre From The Arroyo Colorado To 5 NM North Of Port Mansfield TX; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 11 at 4:43PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Light winds and a warm moist airmass over relative cooler waters
will continue to produce marine fog through tonight. Visibilities
between 1 and 3 miles can be expected posing difficult navigation
for unexperienced mariners and pilots. A slow moving cold front
moving offshore this evening may even allow for reformation of
dense fog and another dense fog advisory may be issued if
visibilities drop below 1 mile.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your local media for further
updates.
